data.title: Mercymount Country Day School
data.text:
The Mercymount Difference

Faithful to Catholic educational tradition, Mercymount Country Day School, sponsored by the Sisters of Mercy, ensures the development of strong academic skills, nurtures creative abilities, creates a sense of community and promotes social responsibility. In the spirit of Catherine McAuley, we affirm that each child is a unique gift of a loving God, open to Godâ€™s presence in others and in all creation.

Admissions

Interested in learning more?

Talk to our admissions office and learn what a private Mercymount education has to offer for your child and family.

Contact Us

Academics

Mercymount prides itself on challenging its students to reach beyond their current capacity for learning and setting goals that surpass current state standards while continually integrating the Sisters of Mercy Mission throughout the learning process.

Student Experience

Beyond our rigorous academics program, Mercymount Country Day School offers an enriching student experience through its many clubs, athletics, and extra curricular activities.

We invite you to explore all the programs and services available to our students.

Mercy in Action

As a Sisters of Mercy school, our students, faculty, and administration demonstrate Catherine McAuley's values in our daily activities, interactions with each other and our community.

Explore the many service ministries available to our students.

Ways to Give

There are many ways to invest in Mercymount and our students. We value your partnership.

Contact Us

Mercymount Families

At Mercymount, we encourage our parents to work with us as partners in nurturing and educating our students, their children. Volunteers are the lifeblood of many of our activities. We encourage all of our parents, grandparents and families to participate in some way throughout the school year.
